fr.liglab.adele.icasa.application

Interface ApplicationRepository


  • public interface ApplicationRepository
    It represents a repository of applications.
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<URL> getApplicationBundleURLs(ApplicationVersion appVersion, ProgressMonitor monitor)
      Returns URLs of bundles we need to deploy to install specified application version.
      List<ApplicationVersion> getAvailableApplications()
      Returns list of available applications.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableApplications

        List<ApplicationVersion> getAvailableApplications()
        Returns list of available applications. Returned list contains only last application version.
        Returns:
        list of available applications.

      • getApplicationBundleURLs

        Set<URL> getApplicationBundleURLs(ApplicationVersion appVersion,
                                ProgressMonitor monitor)
        Returns URLs of bundles we need to deploy to install specified application version.
        Parameters:
        appVersion - application version to install
        monitor - an operation progress monitor (may be null)
        Returns:
        URLs of bundles we need to deploy to install specified application version.
